item.title: The KC Chiefs offense and defense has drastically improved in the last five weeks
Trying new table libraries
item.description: For class I am exploring how to clean data and look at the worst games in football. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.5 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.1.3 ✓ dplyr 1.0.7 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.3 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 2.0.1 ✓ forcats 0.5.1 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(reactable) badfootball <- read_csv("~/Desktop/SPMC 350/Homework/badfootballlogs19.
